Comment_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:YunBoGreeting_00>Well, if it ain't Link. You're so tiny, I
barely even noticed ya.
talk90:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I don't really like that lady...


But it's definitely the <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>'s
fault that everyone's been acting funny.
talk105:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Sure did! Maybe he'll get President
Yunobo to be himself again!
talk91:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_00>Yeah.


President Yunobo said he got that <clr:0000>weird
mask<clr:ffff> he's wearing from the lady too.
Comment_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:YunBoArrogant_00>Bludo. Or should I say "Boss"? You really
don't know your place, do ya?
talk92:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>He was always so nice, but as soon as he
started <clr:0000>wearing it<clr:ffff>, he got real mean...
talk93:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hey, you're friends with President
Yunobo, aren't you? Y'know how he
created YunoboCo for mining?
It was supposed to be helpful for people
who needed ore and stuff... But now it's
just making things weird around here.
If we let you pass, will you convince
President Yunobo to make YunoboCo stop
mining marbled rock roast?
Comment_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>'Cause of the <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>that
<clr:0000>President Yunobo <clr:ffff>is mining...
talk109:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh, hey! It's hot in there. It'd be
dangerous if you went in like that.
Comment_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:YunBoGreeting_00>So, Link. What's your business in
Goron City, huh?
Comment_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01><clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>, huh? And you're
wonderin' about any <clr:0000>strange<clr:ffff> goin's-on?
talk160:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>Don't you worry!


There's nothing to be scared of 'cause
President Yunobo can do his <clr:0000>rumbleboom<clr:ffff>!
talk161:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You're right! Nothing's more powerful
than his <clr:0000>rumbleboom<clr:ffff>!
talk89:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>He's talking about <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff> with
the <clr:0000>blond lady<clr:ffff> right now.

No one's allowed to come in.
talk162:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Hey. Buddy. You know what you should
do if you're in a bind?

Ask President Yunobo to use
his <clr:0000>rumbleboom<clr:ffff>.
talk163:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh? Did you finish what you came to do
at Death Mountain?
talk164:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Come to think of it... Didn't that voice say
there were five padlocks?

<sp:3:0:2:0d01>We haven't unlocked all of the padlocks
yet! We need to look for the rest!
talk165:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Not good, not good! Princess Zelda
is stuck inside there!

We gotta hurry and help her!<sp:5:1:0>


<snd:Notice_00>But how do we get in there...<sp:5:1:0>goro?
talk50:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>If it weren't for my darn spine, I'd march
right into <clr:0000>YunoboCo's HQ<clr:ffff> and give
Yunobo a piece of my mind!
But HQ is in a pain-in-the-neck location,
ya see.

For starters, I'd have to go through the
<clr:0000>northern mining site<clr:ffff>.
talk51:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Everyone's <clr:0000>changed<clr:ffff> because of the
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.

And now this is how things are
around here.
talk157:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Link! We can't afford to let that monster
run riot!

But we're too far away to hit it now.
Let's regroup and come back fresh!
talk159:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>There's been more monsters than
ever since the red haze came outta
<clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>.
That's what the miners told me.<sp:5:1:0>
talk44:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Sad_00>Ugh. That guy.


Used to be just a kid following me around
cryin' "Boss" this and "Boss" that.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>It was all business as usual round here.
Then he created <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>—a group of
Gorons who work the mines.
Once they started diggin' up that
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>, Yunobo and all
the youngsters <clr:0000>changed<clr:ffff>.
talk45:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Used to be just another spoiled tyke,
following me all over the place.

It was all business as usual round here.
Then he created <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>—a group of
Gorons who work the mines.
Once they started diggin' up that
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>, Yunobo and all
the youngsters <clr:0000>changed<clr:ffff>.
talk133:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Is this where I heard the voice
coming from?
talk46:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>That Yunobo. Used to be nothin' more
than a whiny brat, tootlin' around
after me.
Recently he created that rock-mining
group, <clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>, and they started haulin'
in a buncha <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Ever since, everyone's been <clr:0000>actin' funny<clr:ffff>
and now things are like this.
talk47:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>You heard me—changed! All due to that
strange <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff> Yunobo
dug up.
Now all the youngsters just sit around
eatin' it instead of workin'!

Why, some of them are even running
scams, tryin' ta get more <clr:0000>marbled
rock roast<clr:ffff>.
There's no way he can't see what a
mess we're in with it, but he keeps
playin' dumb!
talk120:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you for busting up that mask!
I'm glad we asked for your help.

But I can't believe that the blond lady
was Princess Zelda...

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Never woulda guessed.
talk48:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>That's right. The young'ns have gone
bonkers over this <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.

They haven't been working at all ever
since they got their mitts on the stuff.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>It looks like Yunobo has had some sense
knocked back into him, so that's good.

But if things don't get back to normal for
everyone else, Goron City might well
be doomed.
talk121:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>We're stuck...


Those rocks are rock-hard. I definitely
can't break it.
talk136:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That did the trick!


C'mon, boys. Let's go after
<clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>!
talk49:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:CustomYouTsu><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Argh!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I can't do anything with this back of mine.
What to do...
talk122:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Still can't believe that the blond lady was
Princess Zelda.

Who'da thought!
Comment_20: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Ya think I'm just gonna sit here and—
talk123:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hang on. Now that I look more closely,
I can see that's Yunobo, isn't it?

I got so used to seein' him with that
ridiculous mask on his mug that I barely
recognized him without it.
Comment_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:AngryL_01>Stodgy ol' guy. Stickin' your nose into
things when you've got your spine to
worry about.
talk124:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Well, even if he's returned to his senses,
the situation here sure hasn't.
0008: I'll see what I can do.
Comment_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>Slergo! Offrak! Time to head back to
<clr:0000>YunoboCo HQ<clr:ffff>.
talk110:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you don't have <clr:0000>fire-resistant equipment<clr:ffff>,
you should go to <clr:0000>HQ<clr:ffff> to get some.
Comment_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:AngryL_00>Slergo! Tell me, who runs Goron City
these days?
talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>WHOA. That...that THING broke out of the
crater like it was nothin'!

Is that <clr:0000>marbled rock<clr:ffff>—<sp:5:1:0> Is it alive?! And
there's three of those things?<sp:5:1:0> Hang on,
no— Those are<sp:5:1:0>...heads!
It's SO big! How could something that
large appear out of nowhere like that...

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:AngryL_00>I've never seen anything like this on
Death Mountain, goro!
talk112:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Pretty much everyone started bein' weird
after that <clr:0000>blond lady <clr:ffff>came here...
Comment_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00><clr:0000>Princess<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Zelda<clr:ffff>? I heard she'd gone
missing, but yer tellin' me she's
STILL missing?
I mean, it's hard to miss those lovely
<clr:0000>blond locks <clr:ffff>of hers, after all.
talk113:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hey, aren't you friends with
President Yunobo?

I'll let you pass on one condition.


You gotta convince President Yunobo to
stop mining marbled rock roast.
talk114:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Don't you have any <clr:0000>fire-resistant
equipment<clr:ffff>? The inside of this cave
is too hot for Hylians.
You should go get some over at <clr:0000>HQ<clr:ffff>. It's
the other building near here.
talk129:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>President Yunobo started acting strange
as soon as he put on the <clr:0000>weird mask <clr:ffff>he
got from the <clr:0000>blond lady<clr:ffff>...
He's so unlike himself now. Everything
about him is...different.
talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>If we don't take that thing out, who knows
what will happen to Princess Zelda!

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>But I can't exactly <clr:0000>charge at it <clr:ffff>from
down here...

<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare_01>Any ideas, Link?
Comment_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:AngryL_01>You hear that, Bludo? You're not needed
round here anymore.
Comment_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh, oh! The lady with hair like that! She's
the same one President Yunobo talks to
about <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>!
talk115:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You got it!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01><clr:0000>Fire-resistant equipment!<clr:ffff>


This cave is normally too hot for Hylians,
but since you've got the gear, you're set.
Comment_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Pipe down, you two! You'll keep your
traps shut if ya know what's good for ya!
Comment_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:AngryL_00>As you can see, Goron City is the picture
of peace. And we can't help with
<clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>.
So you'd better shove off.
talk117:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>There's somethin' weird about that mask
of his.
Comment_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Krane! Not you too!<sp:5:0:0> And after all my
warnin's about the <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Comment_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:YunBoArrogant_00>I've gotta go get more <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Can't afford to keep <clr:0000>her<clr:ffff> waiting.
talk118:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:CustomYouTsu><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Argh!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>In this condition, I can't even ride a cart...
What to do...
Comment_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Yunobo! What's the big idea? Talkin' like
that to our esteemed guest!
Comment_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>Yunobo, I swear, if you bring in any more
of that stuff, I'll...
talk119:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>You did it! You brought back our
President Yunobo!

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But, uh... Now we're stuck in here. That
pile of rocks is really big. <sp:5:0:0>And hard.

No way I can break it.
